original_text: You built a place between the city's walls to store water from the Old Pool. But you did not trust the One who made the city. You did not think about the One who decided to build it a long time ago.
korean_text: 너희가 또 옛 못의 물을 위하여 두 성벽 사이에 저수지를 만들었느니라 그러나 너희가 이를 행하신 이를 앙망하지 아니하였고 이 일을 옛적부터 경영하신 이를 공경하지 아니하였느니라

sentences.original_text: You built a place between the city's walls
to store water from the Old Pool
But you did not trust the One who made the city
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 너는 성을 만드신 분을 믿지 않았다

sentences.original_text: You did not think about the One
who decided to build it a long time ago
